mapper.select:
SELECT sli.id FROM sys_login_info sli JOIN sys_user_info sui ON sui.id = sli.user_id JOIN sys_staff_info ssi ON ssi.user_id = sui.id JOIN union_staff_depart usd ON usd.staff_id = ssi.id
usd.department_id = #{depId}

SELECT sdi.id, sdi.comp_id, sdi.depart_name, sdi.parent_id, sdi.telephone, sdi.depart_code, sdi.admin_account, ssi.user_name AS adminName FROM sys_department_info AS sdi LEFT JOIN sys_staff_info AS ssi ON ssi.id = sdi.admin_account and ssi.status in (0, 3)
sdi.status = 0 and sdi.comp_id = #{companyId}

SELECT sdi.id FROM sys_department_info AS sdi JOIN union_staff_depart AS usd ON sid.id = sdi.department_id JOIN sys_staff_info AS ssi ON ssi.id = usd.staff_id
sdi.status = 0 AND ssi.user_id = #{id}
